ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: For them awaits a known provision,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: For them is the sustenance known to Us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: For them there will be a known provision,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: For them is a known sustenance,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: for them awaits a known provision,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: For them there is a known provision,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Those! theirs shall be a provision known:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: For such there is a known provision
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: For them is a Sustenance determined,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: For them there will be a known provision (in Paradise).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: there is waiting for them a known provision;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: For them is a known provision.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Those will have a provision determined -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:41] whose requital is mentioned in His saying: For them there will be, in Paradise, a distinct provision, morning and evening —
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (For them there is a known provision) in measure for the morning and evening of the life of this world, except that over there there is no morning or evening.
